comment: One of my favorite professors. Very enjoyable and funny, he seems like he cares about his students and gave us guidance when we needed it. There was a good deal of writing assignments as well as an assigned book, a few group projects and a research project. If you can, take him for certain.

LOVED HIM. He truly cares about his students and is very understanding about missed work. You read two books in his class and have multiple quizzes on them. He's very clear about what he expects in your writing and what he doesn't and gives good feedback. If you have a chance to take him do it.

Professor Carson is one of the best. He truly cares about his students and is pretty chill. Not too many essays. He likes group projects and attendance is a grade so you have to show up. He usually lets students make up assignments when they miss a deadline. He is actually a funny guy so his lectures are not boring
He is an awesome professor and really cares about his students. I would definitely recommend taking his class. He is an easy grader and will help if you ask.

Professor Carsons English was the most accessible English class I have ever taken. He makes the assignments easy to understand, and the quizzes/ tests are also accessible. My class only had two exams, ten quizzes, around ten assignments, and two group projects. He makes a lot of jokes but when it is time to do work he gets down to it.

I enjoyed the time spent in his class! He can get off topic, but he's quite easy to talk to. Just make sure you at least look over the PowerPoint BEFORE submitting your papers (he does check for grammar and spelling). Also, READ THE BOOK. Although he will give you a lot of the answers, reading for yourself minimizes the confusion in answer choices.

Easy class but grades kinda hard on papers so double-check for grammar. There will be group projects but those are pretty easy. Also don't be afraid to ask him questions or help on something he is very understandable. He will give you second chances on assignments if you don't do as well as you'd like just ask and show that you care.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects

comment: If you take him once, you will want to take him for every class he teaches! He is so funny and really wants you to get an A. Very easy grader and easy to talk to. Lectures often go off topic, but that's something I personally didn't mind in his class. I took online, and it was the best decision ever! Probably the best teacher you can get.

This was a very easy class, but he did get off topic a lot. He didn't grade hard. He's very sweet and does take a while to grade papers. He took like 2 months to grade my paper lol, he also doesn't respond to emails. Overall, work is super easy!
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Group projects--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Carson was one of the greatest professors I have ever had. He was so caring and helpful. Rather than going straight into talking about school, he made sure to take time to check on each student and even remembered things they told him from days before. He is so kind! Very easy grader but also a great teacher. Looked forward to this class.

Mr. Carson is awesome. A sweet old guy who tries to make his lectures engaging and fun. We did do a writing assignment each time we met however they were never hard and usually the topic was engaging so it was not hard to think of something to write. We did a few group projects but those were also really easy. I definitely recommend taking him!!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Group projects

comment: Professor Carson is literally one of the sweetest professors Ive had the pleasure of meeting. His class is easy and all you have to do is write a few paragraphs. He cares and respects all his students, he is highly respected.

Dr. Carson is a model english teacher. He starts the year out by having you write a short essay. This essay doesn't count but he uses to show you how he grades and what he expects. After this I never got below a 93 on a paper. Very involving during lectures. And cares about his students and is very helpful with all things kennesaw.

LOVE PROF and would definitely take him again. Text book and attendance is required. Hes so witty and funny and I wish I had class with him in person. A lot of quick writes so if you cant write an essay in about an hour or if you dont like writing dont take this class. A lot of groups projects and all the questions in quizzes are from the class
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects

comment: Professor Carson is a great guy who cares about the success of his students. He gives a lot of writing assignments but they're worthwhile and can be finished within the class period. As long as you put in the effort, you'll do well! I would gladly take him again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Get ready to read

comment: Professor Carson is an amazing teacher. He is so sweet and funny. Definitely take his class if you can!! You wont regret it!
Professor Carson is a really good man. He is very kind and understanding. All work is done in class, so no homework with the exception of 2 essays. Very easy A and he made the class enjoyable!

I signed up to take Prof Carson in-person this fall, but due to COVID, the class became 100% online. We met during the time of our class online and did almost all of our work in class. If you miss a class you'll miss an assignment and most likely get a 0 on it. But if you show up and do all the work, you'll get an A. I highly recommend taking him!
Hes really nice and caring. He keeps the class interesting and he cares about his students and their learning. I would definitely recommend taking his class
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: I took Professor Carson for English 1101 and 1102 because he was such a great teacher! He is very kinda and sweet to all of his students. He is pretty chill and funny too. If I could take him again I would. His class is very easy as well. Easy grader. I made an A both semesters.

I love Professor Carson so much. I took him for ENGL 1101 and 1102 because he is so sweet and cares so much about your success. Lots of reading and quizzes on what you read but he always goes over EXACTLY what is on the quiz. His classes are small so he will know YOU, do not skip class. His humor is underappreciated. Easy in-class essays! TAKE HIM!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Carson grades HEAVY on papers. Anything and everything on a paper. Good teacher just kind of bland and worries about how your papers are written. I would take again. Tries to be funny during his lectures just awk. However, if you want an easy A then he's the way to go.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects--Tough grader

comment: A really amazing professor! Cares a lot about his students and only wants you to succeed. You have to write a lot of papers but he's such an easy grader. His final was on paper that we could take home to do. His tests are like the power points and the quizzes he gives the answers to you right before it. I'm taking him again next semester!

Mr. Carson is a great teacher that I am taking him again for English 1102. You have to go to class because there will be pop up quizzes over what he used in the powerpoint. This class was a hybrid, and he normally tells you about the friday assignment. He super chill with late work and even turned my classes final into a take home final instead!

Mr. Carson was a nice man, however as a professor he would often treat us like freshmen in high school. The first 3 weeks were about MLA. The class became tedious and almost painful to go to. He would provide good feedback on papers, however there were ALOT of them. I liked him just not his class. He said attendance was mandatory but never checks.
Very easy. Writing essay heavy but very easy. Get ready to print a lot of though. However, if you're looking for an easy class then he's the one for you.
His class is very easy and he is such a nice guy.

He is a super easy professor, but he will put you to sleep so fast. He gives a good amount of writing assignments, but they are all really simple. Lots of grades so it is easy to make an A. Requires attendance. He let me redo a paper that I did bad on and then he gave me full credit. Nice guy, just boring.

Mr. Carson is hands down a great professor. He genuinely cares about his students and their well-beings. There are a couple of group projects and papers to write, but nothing too major. All grades are averaged together, nothing is weighted. I've taken him for ENGL 1101 and 1102 and I wish I could take him again.

Professor Carson is the funniest older man. He makes class enjoyable and doesnt grade to harshly. If you do your work you will pass, if not make an A. There were about 3 group projects and 3-4 essays, not too difficult either. His curriculum changes by semester, but a lot of the work is dependent on whatever the reading is, so buy your books.

TAKE HIM!!!! I had Mr Carson for Eng1101 and 1102, so he knew me and a few others well. Easiest A ever, super funny and really cares about all his students. Only a midterm and a final, the quizzes are reviewed IN CLASS ON THE SAME DAY, and he reviews exactly what we will be quizzed on!! It was so easy. Literally the best professor ever. Love him

Professor Carson is the greatest professor I have had so far at KSU. Hes always so happy and makes your day a little better. Two easy group projects and simple papers here and there. He wants everyone to achieve and get As. Please take him !!!

really awesome. we read hamlet and honestly it was pretty good. there are 2 group projects but super simple so do not be thrown off by that if you get stage fright bc i literally cried in high school presentations but i was fine lol. super easy and gives good feedback on essays. take him fr.

Mr. Carson is a great professor. He is very lenient with his grading. There are some papers to write, but he will help you whenever you need it. As long as you read the books and assignments you will do fine.

Professor Carson is an amazing person and professor. He keeps lectures entertaining and interactive. You can tell he loves what he does. We took many quizzes on assigned reading material but he would go over what would be on the quiz before we took it. He wants you to succeed and is very understanding.

Mr. Carson is an amazing professor. Very friendly and caring. He gives clear expectations of what he wants done. Only two tests (Midterm and Final) that are easy if you study/read the text before class. Papers were typically 1-3 pages. Two 500 word papers. Three group projects, but all were easy. I'm taking him for ENGL 1102 and I can't wait!

Great teacher, very funny and you can tell he cares about each person. Grades comprised of reading hamlet and taking quizzes. He usually reads each act to you before a quiz. Occasional group projects. Prepare to write a good bit but hes an easy grader. Show up and youll be fine
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Hilarious

comment: Professor Carson is absolutely wonderful! There is never a dull moment in his class. He is hilarious and very kind. Would HIGHLY recommend! One book with quizzes, two exams (Midterm & Final), two small group projects, and several small papers/essays.

Carson is one of the nicest people I have ever met in my life, and he's pretty funny too! I just sparknoted the readings before every class period to have an idea of what was going on. His class is so easy and I would highly recommend him.

Such an easy grader. Two essays, some pop quizzes (he lets you make them up if you ask), a midterm and final. Kind of funny, very understanding. Readings before each class and when you go to class you talk about the readings.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor Carson is the sweetest old man!! He is funny and understanding, and you can tell he cares about his student's lives. You will have reading before every class, but it's not too much. All you do in class is listen to him read/discuss reading. Class almost always ended early. 2 essays, some quizzes,& 1 easy group project the entire semester.
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: TAKE HIS CLASS!! Al Carson is one of the best professors I've ever had. Lays out his expectations clearly. If you show up to every class and participate, you're sure to get an A. Allows people to make up missed assignments. Easy grader. You can tell he cares about his students. He always rounds grades up. I wish every teacher was just like him.
Mr. Carson was a terrific teacher who was there for you if you talked to him he'd do his best to help you great teacher even better guy

Professor Carson simply is a basic English teacher. You have to read the books he assigns and you will take quizzes after he goes over the reading. Papers are definitely written in this class but doesn't grade heavily. He cares about his students and usually lets us go early. Highly recommend!
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: I took his course at Reinhardt University and he was absolutely amazing!!! Sweetest man you'll ever meet and his class was a breeze!!!!

My absolute favorite professor at KSU. You will not find a better professor than him. You will learn so much, he's really easy going & extremely nice, he tells you exactly what you need to do to succeed in his class, and if you do your work you'll get an A. We read a novel, did a research paper, and we often did small essay assignments. TAKE HIM!!

I took Dr. Carson for an 8am hybrid. He doesn't assign too much, and all assignments are pretty easy. There are two essays (four if you count mid-term and final) and three reading quizzes. He also gives great feedback on the essays; I would take this class again.
rating_tags: GROUP PROJECTS--Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: AWESOME! I loved professor Carson. He cares about his students and is willing to work with anyone. Just take his papers seriously.

I took Professor Carson as a hybrid class. It was an 8 AM but he did not make it seem like one. There are required texts and readings but he reviews exactly what is on the quiz before it. He is a  funny old man and his assignments aren't very difficult. He gives great feedback on all your writings and is very approachable. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

His class is mainly in-class  assignments and essays. If you miss class, odds are you will miss an assignment and get a 0 but, I made two zeros and still made an A. Super Easy grader, on papers and on tests. Most of his tests are majority essay questions, maybe some true and false or matching. 10/10 would recommend if you need an easy A.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: He's the goat. I failed english retook it with him and  got an A. He is also the man and super cool
Best Professor at Kennesaw hands down. Only had two papers, two test and one group project. Easy grader, take him for an easy A
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: This class was great, I heard stories about other 1101 teachers and it made me so glad I had professor Carson. He doesn't grade hard and gives really good feedback. Definitely made me a better writer but you will be writing almost everyday in his class! Its still worth it though.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Caring

comment: TAKE TAKE TAKE, this is the professor you want for World Lit. Awesome guy, pretty funny sometimes, class is pretty easy, he's an easy grader and made class not boring. Took world lit at another university and it was literally 15x harder and 50x more boring.

Professor Carson is a quirky guy. He made my 8am class seem a lot less dreadful, though. He is a super easy grader. He gave all my essays 99%. I never got below a 95 on anything in his class. He goes over all of the assigned reading before quizzes and basically tells you what is going to be on them. He also allows you 6 absences no questions asked.

This is THE professor you want for 1101. He cares for his students, he is more than willing to work with you, and it's a super easy A. 6 absences allowed then you fail. Usually you write a 500 word "essay" every couple classes but they are more than simple and straight forward. He cares more about you learning than the grade, so he's not too harsh.

Dr. Carson is super nice and goes over all of the reading material thoroughly in class. He is not a tough grader and tells the class when there will be a "surprise" quiz.  There are two 500 word essays and two tests.
He's a really cool dude and helps you in any way possible. The papers he assigns are super easy. He goes over the main points that the paper will require in class. No homework except reading.

I took Mr. Carson for English 1101 and 1102 and I told my friend to take him, so she did too. I am now a senior at Kennesaw and still to this day he was the best teacher I ever had. He's hilarious, personable, smart, any good adjective you can think of. There's nothing but nice things to say about this guy and his classes. TAKE HIM!!!!

Professor Carson is such a sweet an caring man. He makes the class so easy and fun and is relates to the class very well. All assignments in class and i didn't even read the book that was assigned and i got an A on the test over it. That's how well he reviews. I actually look forward to his class and will miss him when its over
Take this professor! Hes very corny and his lectures can be drawn out but the assignments are simple and he grades papers very fairly.

Professor Carson is the sweetest professor in the world. This is my first semester in college, and I love him so much, he was my favorite. He grades easy (100's on essays which never happened in high school) and if you miss assignment in class because you weren't there he lets you do it at home and turn it in later. Don't miss more than 5 classes

Professor Carson was by far my favorite teacher this semester. His class is incredibility easy and is impossible to fail. He gives you study guides for all of the tests. There are no surprises on the tests and as long as you do the study guide, you should be able to make a B or an A on the test.

Not many out of class essays.  Most are in class and pretty short. He is such a wonderful and nice guy. Pretty easy grader for an English class. Read one great book. Probably my favorite professor. For an 8am class, I'm not suffering from boredom. Best English professor hands down. You'll love him! and oh! you must buy the books btw.

Professor Carson was definitely my favorite this semester. His class is extremely easy, just do your work. Gives in class short essays, only had to write outside of class a couple of times, you only read 1 book and it's interesting! He's quirky and makes the class enjoyable. highly recommend! gives 5 free absences
Mr. Carson is the best professor I've taken so far @ KSU. Point. Blank. Period. He's a great person and cares about what he is doing. Respects everybody and will always keep you entertained.

TAKE THIS CLASS.  He is a great person and teacher.  Very funny.  I am a hardworking student, and he really appreciated my hard work.  However, if you are not as hardworking as I, no worries! He gives challenging, but very achievable, assignments and tests.  If you do all the assignments and tests with minimal effort, you will make a B.

This class is extremely easy if you can write well. There are quizzes on the assigned readings, sometimes he tells you in advance, sometimes he doesn't. The midterm and final are short essays and he grades easy. He will accidentally insult everyone in  your class which is hilarious if its not you. He can be quite dense and ignorant, but nice too

LOVED Professor Carson!! He works with you to make sure you can do the best you can in his class. You do write a good number of essays, and one big research paper at the end of the semester. He gives good guidelines on everything. Could not have asked for a better professor.

Prof. Carson is the GREATEST. This was the last English class I needed for graduation and he made it interesting and painless. Yes I said interesting: not only was his class easy, it was actually pretty fun, because he is hilarious and very sweet. You have to read and show up and take the (fairly frequent) quizzes for an A, but it's worth it. :)
Professor Carson was the absolute best! He is so funny. I would definitely recommend him for World Lit. He is very understanding of things. Definitely my favorite professor so far!

Mr. Carson is super nice and easy-going. I took his THREE hour, EIGHT am class, on a FRIDAY and he made it as painless as possible. He doesn't give a lot of homework and he understands that things come up and will accept late assignments. He gives us a twenty minute break app. every hour or so. He is GREAT.
Take this class if you want an awesome English Teacher. Very funny, nice and couldn't ask for a better way to start your day.
An AMAZING professor! I loved him! he was super easy, and the class was interesting. Definitely take this professor! easy A! Gave many essays during the course and got A's on all of them.
what a great professor! very helpful and funny ... also very nice and always wanting to know more about you

My favorite prof at KSU I've had thus far. He improved my writing tremendously and actually cares about your learning. He truly wants his students to succeed. Papers were well-chosen topics. Do the reading, participate in discussions, and turn papers in on time and it's an easy B. Throw in a little extra effort and it's an A. Passed with a 98.

Best ENGL teacher I've ever had. Very nice and funny. Always wears a bow tie. Grades papers easily. Only 1 research paper on a movie. Only have to write a couple of 1-3 pg papers all semester. Some in class projects. Final is not difficult. Can only miss 6 classes all semester before you fail.

He is the greatest English professor that I have had yet. He enjoys his job and being with his students. He makes class interesting and jokes around with the students. Reading is important because he gives random pop quizzes to see if you know the material. I recommend him to anyone!

Hands down the cutest professor ever. Really tries to get students involved and interested. He cares more about relating to you as a person rather than grades. Papers were not given back with grades, but pulled he gives A's where he sees fit. Devistated he isn't teaching 1102.

Mr. Carson is a very helpful professor. He is an older gentleman, but tries to connect with his students. He always starts class with random topics that have happened since the previous class, but they are pretty entertaining. Overall he is a great professor.

He is so nice and funny I absolutely loved his class. He is very laid back and you never have to write an essay out of class except one time. He is the easiest grader of all time. You do have little assignments to do every day but they are really short and easy and we normally get out really early.

I took his summer 2012 semester. In a great mood every day. Very funny. Lacks clarity on assignments but quickly will help you if you don't understand. Group assignments and short essays every day. Short readings but no out of class papers. Multiple choice and short essay midterm. Two essay final.

Carson is the BEST! He is more than helpful, expects you to do the work, and makes class a pleasure.I HIGHLY recommend him but don't take him if you are uptight and have a problem with a relaxed environment..
Professor Carson is too easy of a grader. His assignments are vague and his grading criteria is broad.  Too easy.

While I enjoyed Mr.Carson, he didn't seem to grasp the level he was teaching at. He assumed none of us knew how to write research papers, and then was unclear about what he wanted us to do for the research paper. His assignments leaned more towards the broad and the vague.

Mr. Carson is a great guy. Write papers the best you can, show him that you try your hardest and you will get a good grade. Has a sense of humor and a lot of knowledge. Always interested in what he has to say.

He is a wonderful Prof!!! He is very funny. I took him at 6pm and I never hated going to class. There is a good amount of reading required. if you plan to take him READ THE REQUIRED TEXT!!!! If you dont he will give you quizes. Over all WONDERFUL PROF!!!!
GREAT lit teacher. A lot of writing but he grades very easily. Tells plenty of funny stories throughout class and usually lets everyone leave early. I would definitely recommend him

Great professor! He was always hilarious and taught me so much about the subject. He was adorable and is probably the only guy to pull off a bowtie on a daily basis. You'll love this class! Highly recommended! plus he's super adorable :)
Professor Albert is a wonderful English professor. I learned a lot in his class last Spring. There is a lot of textbook reading but he makes it fun. I would recommend taking him. Great guy!

Professor is a nice man who seems passionate and curious about literature. Humorous, sometimes he imposes his thoughts and beliefs, but overall a good, easy teacher. As long as you go to class and read the assignments, you will do well. Professor does not give students extra credit, however, so be extra studious for the midterm and quizzes.

Let me draw you a picture of the absolute cutest English professor on the planet:  He's really tall, has what could be worked into a handlebar moustache (if he so chose) and wears a bowtie. Darling! He's well-spoken, opens his eyes really big to show emphasis on things, and gets your jokes. I'll miss his goofy self next semester. Too bad...

Great Man! Always had a positive attitude! Easy to understand. Take good notes when he talks & LISTEN. Read the material. You have to read everything and be prepared to write. It was overall an easy class. Enjoyed it. I would take it again.

Interested in leaving someting in our minds that may be useful someday.  Makes us think and reflect.  Had a nice time composing my Haiku.  Loved the assigned texts.  Open and direct.  Great professor (wish we had more like that).
you have to read. and take good notes in class.

I enjoyed this class. Carson has an easygoing attitude. He likes to make you think and he wants to hear your opinon. If you sit and say nothing, he may give you a pop quiz. He had 3 papers/500 words and 2 essay tests. He used only one book, so save some money and take his class.
very helpful and good sence of humor.
he was a very helpful teacher and grades easily
